content.text:
# The Geist of Alec Empire__disambig_1

The Geist of Alec Empire is a 3 CD compilation album by electronic artist Alec Empire. While the majority of the album is tracks previously released on the Mille Plateaux label, some original material is present.
Track listing
CD 1
#"22:24" - 4:44
#*a longer version of this song appears on Low On Ice, this version is approximately the same length as the music video.[http://www.discogs.com/release/715870]
